captions.text:
If this isn't the most amazing dog you've
ever seen, we don't know what is.

The talented pooch named Jiff has made it
into the Guinness World Record books.

Yes, Jiff has achieved the Fastest 10m on
hind legs - in 6.56 seconds and the Fatest

The adorable Pomeranian from LA is said to
practice running on his front and hind legs

daily, and in addition to this he is also
able to shake hands, bow, ride a skateboard
and even stamp his own autograph.

Jiff's anonymous owners don't wish to steal
the shine from their celebrity pet, but he can

be found frequently showing off his skills
in his favourite LA haunts - including Beverley
Hills and the Hollywood Walk of Fame.

This is just the latest achievement in a whirlwind
year for internet sensation Jiff, with his

fanbase on Facebook at 1.3 million likes and
over 200,000 followers on Instagram.

The adorable record-breaking pup features
in the 60th anniversary edition of the annual,

title: Incredible little dog Jiff breaks two world records walking on two paws
